sent.orig: The British call a TV set a telly.
All she does is veg out in front of the telly.
sent.trans: 她成天清闲地泡在电视前。

sent.orig: My room was nice, it was clean, had a nice telly and a safe.
sent.trans: 我的房间很好看，洁净，有一个电视机和保险箱。

sent.orig: You're that bloke off the telly!
sent.trans: 你是电视上的那个傻小子！

sent.orig: I used to come home from training flick the telly on and do my own thing.
sent.trans: 过去，训练过后，我会抛开所有烦恼，做我自己的事情。
